response.overview: When soldier Robin happens upon the dying Robert of Loxley, he promises to return the man's sword to his family in Nottingham. There, he assumes Robert's identity; romances his widow, Marion; and draws the ire of the town's sheriff and King John's henchman, Godfrey.
response.tagline: Rise and rise again, until lambs become lions
response.title: Robin Hood

titles.title: Robin Hood - Das große Abenteuer bevor er zur Legende wurde

results.name: Russell Crowe Takes Down An Army - Extended Preview
The Ambush, The Chase, and The Impersonation
Robin vs. Godfrey at the Cliffs of Dover
Creating Robin Hood's Nottingham from Scratch
Brian Grazer talks about Ridley Scott
